扮.definition: to disguise oneself as; to dress up; to play (a role); to put on (an expression)

扮演.definition: to play the role of; to act

扮裝.definition: to dress up and make up (like an actor)

扮豬吃老虎.definition: to play the wolf in sheep's clothing; to disguise oneself as sth harmless in order to lull one's target into letting their guard down
